subject: Information Request on Counseling Services
body: I am interested in learning more about your counseling services for workplace stress. Can you please provide more details?

subject: Order Confirmation for Course
body: Thank you for your order of the workplace wellness course. We have received your payment and your enrollment is confirmed.

subject: Order Inquiry
body: I have some questions about my recent purchase of a product from your website. Can you assist me?

subject: Phone Call Follow-Up
body: Following up on our phone call earlier today regarding your inquiry on mental health programs for employees.

subject: Support Group for Depression
body: I am looking for support groups for family members of those who suffer from depression. Can you help?

subject: Course Enrollment Confirmation
body: Your enrollment for the mental health and wellness course has been confirmed. Please check your inbox for further details.

subject: Email Feedback Survey
body: We would appreciate your feedback on our recent email communications. Please fill out this short survey.

subject: Request for Consultation
body: I would like to schedule a consultation for workplace mental health training.

subject: Your Order Confirmation
body: Thank you for purchasing from our online shop. Your order has been confirmed.

subject: Office Visit Request
body: Please let us know your availability for an office visit to discuss your employee wellness benefits.

subject: How to Talk to a Family Member About Depression
body: My family member is dealing with depression, and I need advice on how to approach the conversation. Can you provide any guidance?

subject: Confirmation of Course Payment
body: Your payment for the online course has been successfully processed. We look forward to your participation.

subject: Phone Consultation Request
body: I am requesting a phone consultation regarding mental health services available for employees in our company.

subject: Consultation for Workplace Wellbeing
body: We are seeking consultation on improving workplace wellness programs. Please let us know if you can assist.

subject: Facebook Interaction
body: Thanks for reaching out via Facebook. We're happy to continue the conversation here!

subject: Confirmation of Course Registration
body: Your registration for the mental health online course has been confirmed. We look forward to seeing you in the course!

subject: Follow-up on Office Visit Request
body: We received your request for an office visit and would like to confirm your availability for next week.

subject: Need Advice on Supporting a Family Member with Anxiety
body: My family member is struggling with anxiety, and I need advice on how to support them. Any guidance would be appreciated.

subject: Huge Discount on Mental Health Supplements
body: Special discount for a limited time on mental health supplements. Check out the offer now!

subject: Business Consultation Request
body: I would like to schedule a consultation with you regarding our company's mental health initiatives.

subject: Product Inquiry Follow-Up
body: We wanted to follow up on your inquiry about our latest wellness product. Are you still interested?

subject: Call for Information on Family Support Resources
body: Can you share some resources or suggestions for supporting families dealing with mental health issues?

subject: Phone Call Follow-Up Regarding Benefits
body: Thank you for discussing employee wellness benefits over the phone. We would like to provide further details.

subject: Online Support Groups for Mental Health
body: Can you provide more information on support groups for people dealing with mental health challenges?

subject: Request for Information on Wellness Courses
body: I'm interested in knowing more about your wellness courses. Can you provide more details?

subject: Order Status Update
body: Your recent order has been shipped. You can track your package using the link provided.

subject: Facebook Message Follow-Up
body: We noticed your message on Facebook and would like to assist you further. How can we help?

subject: Course Materials Available
body: The materials for your enrolled course are now available. Please log in to access them.

subject: Office Visit Confirmation
body: Your office visit has been scheduled for next Tuesday at 10 AM. Please confirm your availability.

subject: Email Campaign Feedback
body: We would love to hear your thoughts on our recent email campaign. Please take a moment to share your feedback.

subject: Request for Information on Training Programs
body: I would like to know more about your training programs for workplace wellness. Can you provide details?

subject: Your Recent Purchase
body: Thank you for your recent purchase. Your order is being processed and will be shipped soon.

subject: Follow-Up on Office Visit
body: We would like to follow up on your recent office visit. Please let us know if you have any further questions.

subject: Request for Resources on Anxiety
body: Can you provide resources or guidance for family members supporting someone with anxiety?

subject: Course Completion Certificate
body: Congratulations on completing the course! Your certificate is now available for download.

subject: Phone Call Request
body: I would like to schedule a phone call to discuss your services. Please let me know your availability.

subject: Request for Information on Wellness Programs
body: I am interested in learning more about your wellness programs. Can you provide additional details?

subject: Facebook Message Received
body: We have received your message on Facebook and will respond shortly. Thank you for reaching out!

subject: Office Visit Rescheduling
body: We need to reschedule your office visit. Please let us know your availability for next week.

subject: Request for Information on Employee Wellness
body: I would like to know more about your employee wellness programs. Can you provide details?

subject: Order Shipped
body: Your order has been shipped. You can track your package using the link provided.

subject: Office Visit Confirmation
body: Your office visit has been confirmed for next Thursday at 2 PM. Please let us know if you need to reschedule.

subject: Request for Guidance on Mental Health
body: Can you provide guidance or resources for supporting a family member with mental health challenges?

subject: Course Enrollment Reminder
body: This is a reminder that your course enrollment is due soon. Please complete it at your earliest convenience.

subject: Phone Call Follow-Up
body: Following up on our recent phone call. Please let us know if you have any further questions.

subject: Request for Information on Wellness Initiatives
body: I am interested in learning more about your wellness initiatives. Can you provide additional details?

subject: Inquiry About Recent Order
body: Hello, I recently placed an order for sensory toys from your shop. I haven’t received a confirmation email yet. Could you please check the status of my order?

subject: Missing Item in My Order
body: Hi, I received my order today, but one of the items (a communication board) is missing. Could you please look into this and let me know how to proceed?

subject: Order Delivery Issue
body: Hello, I placed an order for educational materials last week, but the delivery address seems to be incorrect. Can you confirm the address and update it if needed?

subject: Request for Order Details
body: Hi, I placed an order for therapy tools a few days ago, but I can’t find the order details in my email. Could you please resend the confirmation and tracking information?
